name: The Penguins Below
description:
The penguins have embarked on a dangerous mission to transport a ton of fish through enemy territory. Will your steady hand guide their submarine safely around mines and depth charges, or will the penguins be ended by what they love?

Controls

Q/A: fill or empty the aft ballast

L/P: fill or empty the fore ballast

Patches

2021/10/05 - Various bugfixes involving mouse pointer, submarine alarm audio, and mine spawn height

 Credits

Oliver Wright — Art and Programming

Steve McStevenson — Programming

Michael Aranda — Music, Sounds, Art, and Programming
